title: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West Have Billions but Don’t Pay Staff?
description:
Kim Kardashian and Kanye West are worth billions, even after their separation from one another.  However, they’re allegedly not paying their employees with all that money in the bank.  Tune in to hear about the recent lawsuits brought against Kim and Kanye by some of their staff.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
